Traits.Name: Dodge
Traits.Description: Immune to all damage and effects on miss or successful save. Resistant to damage from non-attack spaces of area effects.

Traits.Name: Finishing Blow
Traits.Description: Boost damage if character is bloodied.

Traits.Name: Nimble
Traits.Description: Has evasion unless suffering from a status.

Interrupts.Name: Vengeful Slash
Interrupts.Description: When damaged for the first time a round, Berserker deals light damage as an effect to a random adjacent character (for or ally).

Actions.Name: Furious Slash
Actions.CriticalHit: Character must save or become vulnerable.

Actions.Name: Charge
Actions.Description: Dash 4, then deal light physical damage as an effect to an adjacent character.
